featured.text: ＿27＿ you go, there are buildings in Romanic, Baroque, and Rococo styles that were popular hundreds of years ago.

definition.zh_def: 浪漫的，與浪漫主義有關的，或表現出浪漫情感的。
definition.en_def: Relating to romance or characterized by a romantic style or sentiment.
definition.example: Their romantic dinner by the candlelight created a perfect atmosphere.
